description:
Career advancement is forcing the current owners to sell their much-loved home. They only purchased it early in 2022 but the employment opportunities offered elsewhere means they need to sell and do the move. This striking property is positioned in a private setting and can be yours if you act quickly. Proudly built by award winning “Bold Living” homes, late 2018. The property is positioned at the rear of an impressive sized 849sqm block. Ideal for those seeking some privacy and quietness away from annoying street noise.
Bold Living consistently build & deliver homes that are both stylish and have a functionally that suits most young families. This property would be ideal for someone looking for a good-sized home with some extra yard space. With all the “big ticket” extras that have been added to this property and the realistic price, it represents exceptional buying and will sell quickly.
This one delivers on both space & style, family living is the focus of this cleverly executed designer home. Comprising of four genuine bedrooms with the master suite quietly positioned at the rear. Families are spoilt for choice between spending their time in the designer inspired kitchen, dining area or the separate media room. The living area easily extends into the outdoor alfresco area, with views over the established back yard and into the nature strip. The kitchen is feature packed with, stone benchtops, 900mm dual cooker, dishwasher, soft close cabinets and other designer features. The separate TV/ Media room is a real winner, great spot for movie nights or somewhere extra for the kids to hang out. This design is one of Bolds most popular designs and you will see why once you inspect.
Plenty of desirable items outside as well. Obviously the formal (magnesium) inground pool is a huge family draw card, fitted to a 24kw Thermal Heat Pump, swimming & health benefits can be enjoyed pretty much the whole year. The dual 6.6KW solar panelling with look after the energy costs for the pool, the heating and of course the ducted air-conditioning.
The back yard has a 3.3 x 3.3 Stratco shed for extra storage and the professionally terraced lower level offers a very private zone to totally unwind or another area for the bigger pets or kids to play.
This highly sought-after Stockland Estate is a desirable place to live and considered to be the ideal “Place to live”. Situated in the fastest growth corridor of Ipswich where every convenience is only a short drive away. Easy access to both the Cunningham & Centenary HWY makes heading down to Orion Shopping Centre and Springfield train stations and other schooling easy. The very exciting Yamanto Central Village is also a huge local favourite as is all the other big brand stores near-by. Easy walk to the highly regarded Deebing Heights primary school and local BBQ and Parklands.
This is a full- loaded home package that answers all the needs of a young vibrant family, listed below are a few of many extras included. Now is the time to act before someone else calls this one HOME.
KEY PIONTS:
* Good sized “Bold Living Home” on private fenced 849sqm block
* Four genuine bedrooms & two living areas.
* High ceilings thru-out : Designer inspired kitchen
* New magnesium inground pool with 24Kw heat pump
* 2 x 6.6 KW Solar. Multi-zoned 16 Kw Daikin ducted air con
* Genuine “Crimsafe ultimate” security screens
* 8 x 4K Hard wired cameras for peace of mind.
* Multi-stage (3 stage) water filters hard plumbed
* King Throne (ensuite) & Coway bidet toilet with RPZ valves
* Stratco 3.3 x 3.3 shed
* Fully fenced 849sqm block : ICC rates $372.35 per quarter.
Plus much much more.

**Disclaimer: All information is provided in good faith and is accurate to the best of our knowledge, but House Property Agents takes no responsibility for any error or omission. Buyers are encouraged to conduct their own enquiries and should satisfy themselves as to all aspects of the property prior to making any purchasing decision.
